channel.title: Code To Large?
channel.description:
I was putting items into into my class8.java in the client folder and when i compiled i got an error of:
Class8.java:138: code too large public static final Class8 method198(int i) { for(int j = 0; j < 1 0; j++) if(aClass8Array172[j].anInt157 == i) return aC lass8Array172[j]; anInt180 = (anInt180 + 1) % 10; Class8 class8 = aClass8Array172[anInt180]; aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_183.anInt1406 = anIntArray1 95[i]; class8.anInt157 = i; class8.method197(); class8.meth od203(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_183);
And I have actually no idea on how to fix this.. :(
So if you have any idea on how to fix this then please leave a comment.. :D
Thanks for taking the time to look at this post :)

item.title: Code To Large?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

A single method in a Java class may be at most 64KB of bytecode.

Read full topic
